name: TWINE SCROLLING DEMO 2022
description: A short demo of a scrolling engine I pulled out of a game demo I was putting together during  Global Game Jam 2022. This is a partial conversion of the town mechanics from the PC-8801 game Nausicaa Adventure Game from N-88 BASIC to Twine language. It may be too wide for the itch window in some browsers, so be sure to full-screen it to play in that event. This will be re-incorporated into a larger project, but for now I figure it's a solid proof of concept of something I haven't seen pulled off in Twine language before.
